ygData.subject: Re: This is what I have so far on jewelry
ygData.msgSnippet: Have you tried to combine two bars or three bars of enchanted silver with one jewel? I think I heard somewhere that with one bar, you get a ring, with two an
ygData.messageBody:
Have you tried to combine two bars or three bars of enchanted silver with
one jewel? I think I heard somewhere that with one bar, you get a ring, with
two an earring and with three a necklace/amulet...I wouldnt swear though...
Skara

-----Original Message-----
From: Drew Silsby [mailto:asilsby1@...]
Sent: Saturday, April 24, 1999 2:04 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: This is what I have so far on jewelry


From: "Drew Silsby" <asilsby1@...>

Ok, I have been keeping track of different combinations of jewels and this
is my list thus far in response to The Wanderer's post.
All of the below were made with Enchanted Bar's of silver.

1 Enchanted Bar of Silver + 1 Malachite = Silver Malachite Ring
1 Enchanted Bar of Silver + 1 Labis Lazuli = Silver Labis Lazuli
Ring
1 Enchanted Bar of Silver + 1 Turquoise = Silver Turquois
Bracelet
1 Enchanted Bar of Silver + 1 Hematite = Silver Hematite Ring
1 Enchanted Bar of Silver + 1 Cat's Eye Agate = Silver Cat's Eye Necklace
1 Enchanted Bar of Silver + 1 Bloodstone = Silver Bloodstone
Earring
1 Enchanted Bar of Silver + 1 Onyx = Silver Onyx
Bracelet
1 Enchanted Bar of Silver + 1 Jasper = Silver Jasper Ring
1 Enchanted Bar of Silver + 1 Carnelian = Silver Carnelian
Wedding Ring
1 Enchanted Bar of Silver + 1 Star Rose Quartz = Silver Rose Engagement Ring
1 Enchanted Bar of Silver + 1 Amber = Silver Amber Ring

Notice even though I used enchanted siver for all of the above no magical
jewelry was produced. Apparently a more expensive type of metal must be
used to get magic jewelry out of the above stones.
Below is a short list of the magic jewelry that I have created using
enchanted silver.

1 Enchanted Bar of Silver + 1 Jade = Jaded Silver Ring,
Effect: MANA +5
1 Enchanted Bar of Silver + 1 Pearl = Silvered Pearl Ring,
Effect: VS POISON +4
1 Enchanted Bar of Silver + 1 Topaz = Topaz Silver Necklace,
Effect: VS DISEASE +4

Also I was wondering why there are four slots in the jewelry kit. So I
briefly tried a couple attempts using multiple stones. Since both attempts
were unsuccesful and this type of experimenting is expensive I discontinued
this experiment until later. These are the failed attempts:

1 Enchanted Bar of Silver + 1 Malachite + 1 Lapis Lazuli = "These
combinations and quantities of items fail to combine to produce anything."
1 Bar of Silver + 1 Lapis Lazuli + 1 Turquoise = "These combinations and
quantities of items fail to combine to produce anything."

If anyone can add to this list, please feel free.
Also, if anyone can tell me how the skill cap is calculated for jewelcraft I
would like to know, I have a level 14 Enchanter who has a 30 in jewelcraft.
After hitting 30 my skill has not risen even after numerous attempts to
raise it. Am I maxed for my level?


Fren
Gnome, Enchanter
Tunare Server
